p: Three compounds we isolated in this work are common components in essential oils. In our previous research, the essential oil of Dendranthema indicum were extracted, and then the same three isolated compounds (1,8-cineole, chamazulene, and β-caryophyllene) were also isolated [ 45]. In this essential oil, monoterpenoids accounting for over 20%, and the proportion of the other three listed monocyclic ones (4-terpineol, α-terpineol, and γ-terpinene) were nearly 7%.
